timeline.bodyText: Is this kind of code formatting normal for Java? Seems like 1 too many newlines. I'm genuinely curious, though.
timeline.author: drwill-ms

replies.bodyText: In my experience, not necessarily, no. Java usually follows formatting rules similar to C#, where it splits into multiple lines when the no of args/ method calls (for builder pattern) increases.
replies.author: abhipsaMisra
